sqlMap.select:
select f_id, f_name, f_image, f_coolingtime, f_iscommon_cd, f_depletion_parameter, f_depletion_value, f_distance, f_useway, f_target, f_effect_ids, f_isgeneral, f_char_level, f_popsinger, f_learning_book, f_desc, f_revise, f_hurt_revise, f_hurt_append, f_grade_limit, f_skilltype, f_trigger_probability, f_effect_res_id0, f_effect_res_id1, f_effect_res_id2, f_show_order, f_skill_relevance, f_play_delay, f_fly_speed, f_create_learn, f_common_cool_type, f_common_cool_time, f_enmity_value, f_type, f_big_ico, f_sound, f_hurted_trib, f_wugong_type, f_source, f_kanxing_skill, f_beidong_base_value, f_is_zuhe, f_bang_gong, f_learn_type, f_name_i18n, f_desc_i18n, f_source_i18n, f_show_action, f_arrow_way,f_upgrade_desc,f_upgrade_desc_i18n from t_skill
order by $orderByClause$

select f_id, f_name, f_image, f_coolingtime, f_iscommon_cd, f_depletion_parameter, f_depletion_value, f_distance, f_useway, f_target, f_effect_ids, f_isgeneral, f_char_level, f_popsinger, f_learning_book, f_desc, f_revise, f_hurt_revise, f_hurt_append, f_grade_limit, f_skilltype, f_trigger_probability, f_effect_res_id0, f_effect_res_id1, f_effect_res_id2, f_show_order, f_skill_relevance, f_play_delay, f_fly_speed, f_create_learn, f_common_cool_type, f_common_cool_time, f_enmity_value, f_type, f_big_ico, f_sound, f_hurted_trib, f_wugong_type, f_source, f_kanxing_skill, f_beidong_base_value, f_is_zuhe, f_bang_gong, f_learn_type, f_name_i18n, f_desc_i18n, f_source_i18n, f_show_action,f_upgrade_desc,f_upgrade_desc_i18n from t_skill where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
